Package it.sauronsoftware.junique

Provides the classes necessary to implements a user related cross-JVM exclusive lock concept.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageHandler
    This interface describes how to handle messages received through an ID lock channel.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JUnique
    Point-of-entry of the JUnique library.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AlreadyLockedException
    This exception is thrown when an ID cannot be locked since it is currently already locked by another JUnique caller.

Package it.sauronsoftware.junique Description

Provides the classes necessary to implements a user related cross-JVM exclusive lock concept.
